title.en: Graph Neural Networks for Crystal Structures
title.zh-Hans: 晶体结构的图神经网络

summary.en: Message-passing neural networks that operate on crystal graph representations for property prediction.
summary.zh-Hans: 在晶体图表示上运行的消息传递神经网络，用于性能预测。

description.en: GNNs encode crystal structures as graphs where atoms are nodes and bonds are edges. Message-passing layers aggregate neighbor information to learn atomic representations. Variants include CGCNN, MEGNet, and our CrystalGNN.
description.zh-Hans: GNN将晶体结构编码为图，其中原子为节点，化学键为边。消息传递层聚合邻居信息以学习原子表示。变体包括CGCNN、MEGNet和我们的CrystalGNN。
